gardening.name: Black Growbag
gardening.description: Eco-friendly white growbag suitable for small-scale gardening. Provides excellent drainage to prevent overwatering. Easy to fold and store when not in use. Durable material ensures a long life of repeated use.

gardening.name: Green Growbag
gardening.description: Eco-friendly white growbag suitable for small-scale gardening. Provides excellent drainage to prevent overwatering. Easy to fold and store when not in use. Durable material ensures a long life of repeated use.

gardening.name: White Growbag
gardening.description: Eco-friendly white growbag suitable for small-scale gardening. Provides excellent drainage to prevent overwatering. Easy to fold and store when not in use. Durable material ensures a long life of repeated use.

gardening.name: Ceramic Pot
gardening.description: Small ceramic pot ideal for indoor plants. Elegant design that complements home décor. Provides stable support for plant growth. Easy to clean and maintain over time.

gardening.name: Hanging Pot
gardening.description: Perfect hanging pot for balcony or indoor décor. Lightweight and durable design. Helps save floor space while displaying plants beautifully. Resistant to outdoor weather conditions.

gardening.name: Octa Pot
gardening.description: Octagonal pot with modern design for stylish interiors. Large capacity suitable for medium-sized plants. Promotes proper drainage to prevent waterlogging. Durable and long-lasting material.

gardening.name: Plastic Pot
gardening.description: Affordable plastic pot for everyday use. Lightweight and easy to handle. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor plants. Resistant to cracking and weather damage.

gardening.name: Titan Pot
gardening.description: Large titan pot for decorative or functional use. Perfect for indoor trees and shrubs. Strong and durable material ensures stability. Stylish design enhances garden or interior aesthetics.

gardening.name: Wallmounting Pot
gardening.description: Space-saving wall-mounted pot for small spaces. Easy to install and secure. Ideal for growing herbs or decorative plants. Resistant to outdoor conditions for long-term use.

gardening.name: Bio Fertilizer
gardening.description: Nutritious bio fertilizer for healthy plant growth. Enriches soil naturally without chemicals. Suitable for all types of plants and soils. Improves soil fertility over repeated use.

gardening.name: Liquid Fertilizer
gardening.description: Easy-to-use liquid fertilizer for rapid plant nourishment. Quickly absorbed by roots for faster growth. Safe for indoor and outdoor plants. Enhances plant color and flower bloom.

gardening.name: Organic Fertilizer
gardening.description: 100% organic fertilizer for natural plant care. Improves soil texture and fertility. Promotes healthy root and leaf development. Safe for edible plants and flowers.

gardening.name: Soil Mix
gardening.description: Premium soil mix for potted plants and garden beds. Enhances soil drainage and aeration. Enriched with nutrients for healthy plant growth. Ideal for vegetables, herbs, and flowers.
